en.label: The Vale Reckoning
en.description: A fantasy calendar used in northern mountain valleys, where each season breathes myth and memory. Features an 8-month cycle, 6-day week, and sacred festival days.

months.name: Frostwane
months.description: The dying of winter. A time of silence, hunger, and huddled survival.

months.name: Thawmarch
months.description: The breaking thaw. Ice splits, rivers churn, and wolves hunt the weak.

months.name: Greenspire
months.description: First blooms and returning birds. Rains soften the land for planting.

months.name: Embertide
months.description: The burn months. Smoke, sowing, and the dance of ash over fields.

months.name: Highsun
months.description: Midyear heat. Dreams burn bright, tempers burn brighter.

months.name: Harvestwane
months.description: Golden dusk. Crops ripen, blades are sharpened, debts are settled.

months.name: Gravecall
months.description: Long shadows and whispered names. The living and dead walk closest.

months.name: Deepfrost
months.description: The world stills again. Fires dim, and breath clouds in the chill.

weekdays.name: Brightday
weekdays.description: Auspicious. New journeys, clear skies, and clean starts.

weekdays.name: Graftday
weekdays.description: Work and toil. Markets bustle, and fields are plowed.

weekdays.name: Stoneday
weekdays.description: Hearth and holdfast. A day for home, rest, and repairs.

weekdays.name: Bitterday
weekdays.description: Ill omens and arguments. Avoid risk and stay wary.

weekdays.name: Wyrdday
weekdays.description: Mystic alignments. Tales are told, stars watched, and truths divined.

weekdays.name: Graveday
weekdays.description: Remembrance and endings. The dead are honored, the past weighed.

intercalary.name: Hearthmoor
intercalary.description: A night of survival rites and shared flame. The long dark wanes.

intercalary.name: Stormrest
intercalary.description: Offerings are left to the storm spirits. Farmers call this the floodwatch.

intercalary.name: Suncrest
intercalary.description: The longest day. Madness, passion, and visions flare under the open sky.

intercalary.name: Ashfall
intercalary.description: Ashes of the year are buried or scattered. Old names are sung, and debts burned.
